metadata.title: CVE-2023-1297 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - low.
metadata.description: Consul and Consul Enterprise's cluster peering implementation contained a flaw whereby a peer cluster with service of the same name as a local service could corrupt Consul state, resulting in denial of service. This vulnerability was resolved in Consul 1.14.5, and 1.15.3

criterions.comment: consul package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
